About Us: Outreachgrowth is a dynamic digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses grow through innovative design and strategic marketing. Creating engaging social media designs, posts, and banners that capture attention and drive engagement. Developing web-related artwork, including web banners and landing page designs, that enhance user experience. Crafting professional business cards and stationery that make a lasting impression. Designing responsive and aesthetically pleasing website layouts that reflect our clients' vision. Producing impactful posters and catalogue designs for various marketing campaigns. Developing packaging and label designs that stand out on the shelf and communicate the product's value. Requirements: Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Strong understanding of design principles, typography, and colour theory. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines. Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with the team. A keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually stunning designs. If you're passionate about design and eager to make an impact, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you’d be a great fit for this role. Job Title: Graphic Designer Location: Redapple head office (Khadda Market). Job Type: Full-Time (Hybrid), 6 days a week (2 days WFH), Saturday on site Salary Package: 70-90,000 PKR We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic Designer to join our team, responsible for developing compelling visuals that resonate with our target audience and reflect our brand values. Key Responsibilities: · Design Creation: Develop and design high-quality marketing materials, including social media graphics, website visuals, print advertisements, packaging, and promotional content. Ensure designs are tailored to meet the specific needs of each branch and campaign. · Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to understand campaign goals, audience insights, and feedback. Collaborate effectively to ensure visuals support and enhance marketing efforts. · Research & Trends: Stay up-to-date on the latest design and marketing trends to ensure our visuals are current, engaging, and effective. Use research and data to inform design decisions, improving visual impact and engagement. · Multi-Tasking: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality work while meeting deadlines. · Software Proficiency: Utilize Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Canva, Figma, and other tool's like Adobe XD and Procreate for design work. · Video Editing: Apply basic video editing skills for creating Instagram and Facebook Reels. Ensure video content is engaging and aligns with the brand’s overall visual strategy. · Ownership & Innovation: Take ownership of design projects from concept to delivery. Provide creative input and propose innovative design solutions that align with brand messaging and strategy. Qualifications: · Experience: Minimum of 2-5 years of experience in graphic design, with a strong portfolio showcasing diverse projects, preferably with a focus on food, marketing, or related fields. · Skills: Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop and Illustrator), Canva, Figma, Affinity Designer, and Adobe XD. Knowledge of the latest design trends, techniques, and best practices. · Creativity: Strong creative skills with the ability to think outside the box and contribute original ideas. · Communication: Excellent communication skills with the ability to work independently with minimal supervision, while also work collaboratively with marketing team members. · Attention to Detail: High level of attention to detail and accuracy in design work. · Education: Bachelor's degree in graphic design, Visual Arts, Marketing, or a related field is preferred. What We Offer: - Competitive salary and benefits package. - Opportunity for creative ownership and professional growth. - A collaborative and dynamic work environment. - Flexibility with 2 days of remote work per week. Please submit your resume, and a portfolio showcasing your recent design work related to food or marketing. Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled **Lead Conversion Specialist** to handle and convert incoming leads from our Facebook and Instagram ad campaigns. The ideal candidate will engage with potential clients through chat or calls, understand their needs, and convert them into qualified leads for our web design and logo services. Responsibilities:
- Respond promptly to incoming leads from **Facebook/Instagram ads** via chat or direct message.
- Engage in meaningful conversations with potential clients to **understand their needs** and explain our web design and logo services.
- Convert leads into **qualified prospects** by answering questions, addressing concerns, and highlighting the value of our services.
- Schedule follow-up calls or meetings with leads who require more information.
- Close deals by guiding leads through the decision-making process, whether on chat or calls.
- Keep accurate records of lead interactions, conversations, and outcomes using CRM or lead management tools.
- Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to improve lead nurturing and conversion strategies. Qualifications:
- Proven experience (minimum 3+) in **lead conversion** through chat or phone calls, ideally in the digital services niche.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to engage and build rapport quickly with potential clients.
- Experience in working with **Facebook Messenger**, **Instagram Direct**, and other social media communication tools.
- Ability to handle objections and guide leads toward making a purchase decision.
- Experience using CRM tools or lead tracking software to manage and monitor leads.
- High level of customer service, with a friendly and professional approach. Preferred Skills:
- Background in **web design**, **graphic design**, or digital marketing services.
- Experience in **sales** or **customer service** in the digital space.
- Familiarity with **online booking systems** to schedule calls or appointments. Deliverables:
- Successfully convert incoming leads into **qualified clients** for our web design and logo services.
- Maintain a conversion rate based on agreed-upon goals (to be discussed).
- Provide weekly reports on lead conversions and insights into how processes can be improved. Job Type: Full-time Pay: Rs70,000.00 - Rs99,000.00 per month Application Question(s): How many years of work experience do you have with Digital Marketing Agencies? What is your average deal size in USD (in thousands)? How many years of work experience do you have with Telemarketing? Expected Start Date: 01/10/2024
